alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 06 at 8:35PM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River near Abbeville affecting Dodge, Wilcox and Telfair Counties. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Jackson, Juliette, Griffin, East Juliette, West Macon, Dames Ferry, Macon, Hawkinsville, Byron, Hawkinsville, Clinchfield, Abbeville, McRae, Scotland, Lumber City... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast to begin early tomorrow afternoon. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River near Abbeville. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...Between 10 and 12 feet, Bankfull conditions begin upstream and downstream from the gage at Highway 286. Water begins to spill out into low lying areas of the flood plain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EST Thursday the stage was 11.5 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 12.6 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.5 feet on 12/31/1956. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
